verbose_text: These results are in agreement with those of previous studies, demonstrating the expression of (pro) renin, angiotensinogen, ACE and ACE2, AT1R and AT2R, Mas and IRAP in several islet specific cell types, specifically in beta-cells, in various species including humans, rats, mice and canines.
